t: Perrier Energize is Perrier’s first carbonated energy beverage with caffeine and Yerba Mate
s: May 11, 2021 - Perrier Energize joins the Perrier brand’s broad line-up of carbonated mineral water including Perrier Original, and the full assortment of Perrier flavored carbonated mineral water with natural flavors including Lime, Pink Grapefruit, Peach, Pineapple and more. Just in time for summer, Perrier Energize is now available at retailers including Target, CVS, 7-Eleven, and Amazon...

t: Perrier Now Makes an Energy Drink and You Can Taste it for FREE
